Posts.Content: Maree155 wrote: Hi I am new to this site...just wondering if there is anyone else out there that might be starting chemo around the same time as me that would like to chat? Dx 3/3/2015, IDC: Medullary, Left, 3cm, Grade 3, 2/15 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 3/12/2015 Lymph node removal: Underarm/Axillary; Mastectomy: Left Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo 13th Of May 2015. Maree155 tjh
